Neighbour_01.synopsis: Vignette: In the Dead of Night one-liner. Flaming fist dealing with a nuisance citizen making a report. Thinks the player is about to do the same.

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02.synopsis: Vignette: The neighbour  saw movement around here at night. The smell was rotten and dead. Another neighbour is concerned too

Neighbour_02.synopsis: Vignette: In the Dead of Night one-liner

Neighbour_01_0.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
Neighbour_01_0.text: I'll make a report to the city maintenance teams. They'll fix it, eventually.
Neighbour_01_0.context: NodeContext: Not holding out much hope of this

Neighbour_01_1.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
Neighbour_01_1.text: Don't worry about the smell, citizen - probably just the drains. Nothing to concern yourself with.

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_0.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_0.text: So what exactly did you see?
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_0.context: NodeContext: Exasperated, trying to patiently deal with an idiot civiliant reporting a crime

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_2.speaker: Battrick Degronce
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_2.text: I don't rightly know. But they was up to no good, lurching this way and that.
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_2.context: NodeContext: Struggling to give a good explanation for his suspicion

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_1.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_1.context: NodeContext: Exasperated, trying to patiently deal with an idiot civiliant reporting a crime

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_6.speaker: Battrick Degronce
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_6.text: What am I s'pposed to do then? Miscreants creeping around, a stink like death itself... It ain't safe.
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_6.context: NodeContext: Getting frustrated, Flaming Fist isn't helping. Listing off his problems

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_5.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_5.text: What do you want me to do? Arrest a smell?
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_5.context: NodeContext: Like it's obvious, what was he expecting?

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_3.speaker: Battrick Degronce
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_3.text: Some help you are. Where's the Steel Watch when you need 'em?

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_8.speaker: Battrick Degronce
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_8.text: What about the smell? It stinks something rotten.

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_4.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_4.text: Probably just a dead cat. *Sniffs.* Maybe a few dead cats.
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_4.context: NodeContext: Lazy explanation, doesn't really want to deal with this. Sniffing to check a strange smell in the street.

AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_7.speaker: Battrick Degronce
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_7.text: How's a dead cat making a stink like that?
AD_Neighbour_01_Neighbour_02_7.context: NodeContext: Annoyed the Flaming Fist doesn't believe him, thinks this is a stupid suggestion

Neighbour_02_0.speaker: Battrick Degronce
Neighbour_02_0.text: Don't bother reporting it. The Fists don't care what happens down here.
Neighbour_02_0.context: NodeContext: Bitter, used to Flaming Fists ignoring them

Neighbour_02_1.speaker: Battrick Degronce
Neighbour_02_1.text: You can smell that, right? Bloody rotten, it is.
Neighbour_02_1.context: NodeContext: rehetorical question, looking for back up that the smell exists and is worth worrying about
